section.p: A record of a feeding item and the quantity in which it is ordered.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] quanity with data type Integer Ratio
The ordered quantity of the requested food item.

Contains exactly one [1..1] supplementalFeedingItem with data type Code
An item that is requested as part of a supplemental feeding order.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quanity with data type Integer Ratio
The ordered quantity of the requested food item.

Contains exactly one [1..1] supplementalFeedingItem with data type Code
An item that is requested as part of a supplemental feeding order.
